subject: Re: '469 availability
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
This first one, or #36 I don't have a case for yet. 37 will be in a 
case close to the larger RS project boxes, but it's home made to save a 
few bucks. For the 469, the case has to be plastic or wood, so as not 
to block radio reception. If this stuff was all prfected, and all the 
boxes worked great, I wouldn't mind spending money on them, but to me 
it's all experimental, and they don't all work as well as I would like.

 Frank-S 

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Marlboro63@... wrote:
>
> Frank,
>  
> Have you given any consideration to what kind of case to put these 
units  in. 
> Also what are you doing for the audio amplifier for the speaker?
>  
> Jeff
